data.text: Yahweh, you have examined me,
You know when I sit down and when I stand up.
When I travel and when I lie down,
Yahweh, even before I say [MTY] anything,
You protect me on all sides;
I am not able to understand that you know everything about me.
◄Where could I go to escape from your Spirit?/I could not go anywhere to escape from your Spirit.► [RHQ]
If I went up to heaven, you would be there.
If I had wings and flew very far east [MTY],
you would be there also, to lead me by your hand,
I could request the darkness to hide me,
but even if that happened, the darkness would not be darkness for you!
You created all the parts of my body;
I praise you because you made my body in a very awesome and wonderful way.
When my body was being formed,
You saw me before I was born.
God, what you think about me is very precious (OR, is very hard to understand).
If I could count them, I would see that they are more than the grains of sand at the seashore.
God, I desire that you would kill all the wicked people!
They say wicked/malicious things about you;
Yahweh, I certainly [RHQ] hate those who hate you!
I hate them completely,
God, search my inner being;
Find out whether there is anything evil in my inner being,
